---
id: get-resources-v-3
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /resources endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(/resources)```. **FamilyType**: ```Resources``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/345178528/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Recursos+-+v3.0.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /resources endpoint"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /resources endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/data/v3/resources/{consentPactualId}/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(/resources)```. **FamilyType**: ```Resources``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/345178528/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Recursos+-+v3.0.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"pactualId","description":"The Data operation PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["data","links","meta"],"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"description":"Lista de recursos e seus respectivos status.","minItems":0,"type":"array","items":{"required":["resourceId","type","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"resourceId":{"description":"Identifica o recurso reportado pelo participante do Open Finance, no caso de:\nContas de depósito à vista, de poupança ou de pagamento pré-paga : corresponde ao accountId;\nConta de pagamento pós-paga: corresponde ao creditCardAccountId;\nEmpréstimos, Financiamentos, Direitos creditórios descontados e Adiantamento a depositantes: corresponde ao contractId.\n","maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,99}$","type":"string","example":"25cac914-d8ae-6789-b215-650a6215820d"},"type":{"description":"Tipo de recurso (vide Enum):\nAccount - Conta de depósito à vista, poupança ou pagamento pré-paga\nCredit Card Account - Conta de pagamento pós-paga (Cartão de Crédito)\nLoan - Empréstimo\nFinancing - Financiamento\nUnarranged Account Overdraft - Cheque Especial\nInvoice Financing - Financiamento de Fatura\n","enum":["ACCOUNT","CREDIT_CARD_ACCOUNT","LOAN","FINANCING","UNARRANGED_ACCOUNT_OVERDRAFT","INVOICE_FINANCING","BANK_FIXED_INCOME","CREDIT_FIXED_INCOME","VARIABLE_INCOME","TREASURE_TITLE","FUND","EXCHANGE"],"type":"string","example":"ACCOUNT"},"status":{"description":"Tipo de status de recurso (vide Enum):\nAvailable - Disponível\nUnavailable - Indisponível\nTemporarily Unavailable - Temporariamente Indisponível\nPending Authorisation - Pendente de Autorização\n","enum":["AVAILABLE","UNAVAILABLE","TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE","PENDING_AUTHORISATION"],"type":"string","example":"AVAILABLE"}}}},"links":{"description":"References to other resources of the requested API.","required":["self"],"type":"object","properties":{"self":{"format":"uri","description":"Full URI that generated the current response.","maxLength":2000,"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)?(www\\.)?[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#=]{2,256}\\.[a-z]{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\\+.~#?&\\/\\/=]*)$","type":"string","example":"https://api.banco.com.br/open-banking/api/v1/resource"},"first":{"format":"uri","description":"URI of the first page that originated this result list. Restriction - Required when not the first page of the response.","maxLength":2000,"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)?(www\\.)?[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#=]{2,256}\\.[a-z]{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\\+.~#?&\\/\\/=]*)$","type":"string","example":"https://api.banco.com.br/open-banking/api/v1/resource"},"prev":{"format":"uri","description":"URI of the previous page in this result list. >
